content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) connected to the mining drill
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), and (-13.5, -49.5) for ore storage
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5) and (-12.5, -49.5) for additional storage

### Iron Plate Smelting Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Iron Chests at positions (-13.5, -49.5) and (-14.5, -47.5) for storing iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (-9.5, -49.5) for additional storage

### Coal Storage and Distribution System at Position (47.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5) for storing coal
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5) for transferring coal between chests
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) for additional storage

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Inserter Fuel Management
- Ensure all inserters have sufficient fuel to operate. Check fuel levels regularly and refuel as necessary to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors with Full Storage Chests
- Regularly check and clear storage chests to prevent overflow. Full chests can halt production processes, so ensure there is always space for new items.

### Errors with Furnace Refueling
- Monitor fuel levels in furnaces to ensure continuous smelting. Refuel furnaces before they run out of fuel to avoid production delays.

### Errors with Inserter Operation
- Ensure inserters are correctly positioned and have access to both source and destination entities. Check that inserters are not blocked and have clear paths for item transfer.
